titleStmt.title: SII 12.206: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 206. (A.R. No. 432 of 1921). TIRUVEṆṆAINALLŪR, TIRUKKOYILUR TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE MAṆḌAPA CONTAINING THE SŌMĀSKANDA IMAGES IN THE KṚIPĀPURĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription records that the chief exempted, from his 18th year, the garden called ‘Ānaikku-araśu-vaḻaṅgum-perumāḷCf. the title ‘āṭṭukku-āṉai-vaḻaṅgum-perumāḷ’ (A.R. No. 146 of 1923).-tiruttōppu’ at Tiruveṇṇainallūr and ‘Kōpperuñjiṅgan-tōppu’ at Śīḻagampaṭṭi which he had presented to the temple and also other dēvadāna lands from payment of taxes and that he ordered the amount thus remitted to be utilised for rearing gardens (tōppu) and with the balance, if any, to provide for worship and repairs in the temple of Āṭkoṇḍadēva at Tiruveṇṇainallūr. The epithet Āṉaikku-araśu-vaḻaṅgum-perumāḷ which means ‘he who gave away the kingdom for an elephant’ has not been met with before, and it is not known what incident it refers to.
The document is attested by Kōpperuñjiṅga, Toṇḍaimāṉ, Viḻuppādarāyaṉ and Kurukulattaraiyaṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī Avaṉiyāḷappi
ṟantāṉ kopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 10 8vatu nāḷil rāja
rājavaḷanāṭṭu tirumuṉaippāṭit tiruveṇṇainallūrnāṭṭu brahmateyam
tiruveṇṇainallūr Uṭaiyar Āṭkoṇṭatevarkku patiṉeṭṭāvatu A
ṟpaci māta mutal tirunāmattukkāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumāka Iṭṭa tirut
toppukaḷil nilattukkum tirunāmattukkāṇiyāṉa paḻantevatāṉamā
ṉa nilattukkum IṟaiIliyāka tantaruḷiṉa tirumukattukku kalveṭṭu . ko
pperuñciṅkaṉ Olai . tiruveṇṇainallūruṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭa
tevar koyilil tevarkaṉmi koyilkaṇakkaṉ kaṇṭu viṭai . Iṉṉāyaṉā
ṟku Ivvūril tirunāmattukkāṇi Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu ceyvittu nām kuṭutta
Āṉaikku Aracuvaḻaṅkum perumāḷ tiruttoppu nilam paṉṉiraṇṭu māvum
nām muṉpu viṭṭa ciḻakampaṭṭil kopperuñciṅkaṉ toppukkum
Iṭa niccayitta Āḷ patinālukkum Iṉnāyaṉārruṭaiya tevatāṉa nilaṅkaḷi
l tāḷamuṟi puñcey puṟavaṭai kācāyamum pacāṉa Uṭalil nimanta miṭṭu me
leṟṟamāṉa Uṭalum tiruttoppukaḷi luṭalum koyil paṇṭārattukku
Uṭalāka patiṉeḻāvatu tāḷamuṟi mutal kaikkoṇṭu mutaliṭṭuk koḷḷavu
m . Ivvuṭalile Ivarkaḷukku Iṭa niccayitta Ilakkai catirappaṭiyāl U
ḷḷa nellum kācum patiṉeṭṭāvatu Aṟpacimāta mutaliṭṭu toppukka
ḷ ceyvikkavum . nikki niṉṟa Uṭalkoṇṭu pūcaiyum tiruppaṇiyun celu
ttuvatākavum coṉṉom . Ippaṭi ceyvate . Ivai kop
peruñciṅkaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai toṇṭamāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai viḻuppā
tarāyaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai kurukulattaraiyaṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 12.206 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
